about_the_game:
Get ready to immerse yourself in a dark world full of challenges in Dimachaerus, an exciting medieval hack'n slash game with a touch of cartoon-style graphics! Master the skills of an undead knight as you face hordes of enemies of darkness in an epic journey full of action. In Dimachaerus, you take on the role of a warrior reborn from the shadows, determined to defeat a villainous wizard who has captured the princess. Use a variety of weapons found in the environment, from swords and axes to crossbows, as you face undead enemies and sinister creatures in intense battles. Explore magnificent and dark scenarios, each filled with deadly dangers. Improve your combat skills and find powerful equipment to face increasingly greater challenges as you progress in your mission to save the kingdom from darkness.

Features:
-Action
-Third-person 3D controls with medieval combat mechanics
-Utilize equipment found in the environment and make combos with different weapons to combat hordes of enemies
-Cartoon-style characters with a gothic and dark theme
-Advance levels with increasingly aggressive enemies but with greater rewards
-Follow the path and prepare to face the malevolent wizard to save the princess
-Enjoy being a zombie and fight without fear of death
